players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night."

You: "

"
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night. Charlie also said he investigated Bob. We can't trust either of them."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night."
